title: Introduction to C Programming
description: Explore the fundamentals of the C programming language. Learn about variables, data types, control structures, and functions.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
description: Dive into the world of algorithms. Understand various algorithmic techniques and strategies for problem-solving and optimization.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
description: Get started with C++ programming language specifically tailored for data structures and algorithms. Cover topics like classes, inheritance, and templates.

title: Basic Data Structures
description: Learn the fundamental data structures essential for computer science and programming. Topics include arrays, linked lists, stacks, queues, and trees.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
description: Discover the principles of Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) using Python. Learn about classes, objects, inheritance, and polymorphism.

title: Software Engineering
description: Gain insights into the principles and practices of software engineering. Cover topics like software development lifecycle, design patterns, and agile methodologies.

title: AWS
description: Learn how to leverage Amazon Web Services (AWS) for cloud computing. Explore services like EC2, S3, RDS, and Lambda for building scalable and reliable applications.

title: Cloud Computing
description: Understand the concepts and technologies behind cloud computing. Learn about virtualization, distributed systems, containerization, and cloud deployment models.

title: Database (MySQL)
description: Master the fundamentals of database management using MySQL. Cover topics like database design, querying data, transactions, and database security.
